Package org.efs.activator.config

package org.efs.activator.config
This package provides typesafe configuration bean classes which may be loaded from a file as follows: 
    final File configFile = new File("filename");
    final com.typesafe.config.Config configSource = com.typesafe.config.ConfigFactory.parseFile(configFile);
    final EfsActivatorConfig.create(configSource, EfsActivatorConfig.class);

EfsActivator.loadActivator(String) loads an activator typesafe configuration from the given file name and returns a new EfsActivator instance based on that configuration.

An example workflow configuration using typesafe follows: 

workflows = [
  {
    name = "hot-start"
    stages = [
      {
        // Stage one: move market data agent to stand-by.
        steps = [
          {
            agent = "market-data-agent"
            beginState = STOPPED
            endState = STAND_BY
            allowedTransitionTime = 100 millis
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        // Stage two: activate market data agent and put algo
        // agent into stand-by.
        steps = [
          {
            agent = "market-data-agent"
            beginState = STAND_BY
            endState = ACTIVE
            allowedTransitionTime = 100 millis
          },
          {
            agent = "make-money-algo-agent"
            beginState = STOPPED
            endState = STAND_BY
            allowedTransitionTime = 100 millis
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        // Stage three: activate money making algo.
        steps = [
          {
            agent = "make-money-algo-agent"
            beginState = STAND_BY
            endState = ACTIVE
            allowedTransitionTime = 100 millis
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
 ]

Please see org.efs.activator for a detailed description on how to define a typesafe configuration in a file.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.efs.activator
    Provides ability to transition efs agents between stopped, stand by, and active states according to user-defined workflow.
    org.efs.activator.event
    This package defines the ActivatorEvent posted by EfsActivator to registered agents.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EfsActivatorConfig
    A typesafe bean configuration used to define a named workflow traveling in a given direction across a given set of steps.
    WorkflowConfig
    An activator work flow takes one or more agents from a given start state to a target end state.
    WorkflowStageConfig
    A typesafe bean configuration used to define steps within a workflow stage.
    WorkflowStepConfig
    A typesafe bean configuration used to define a workflow step within a workflow stage.
